functions.name: Advisory L PUMP
functions.description: Left fuel boost pump pressure low

functions.name: Advisory R PUMP
functions.description: Right fuel boost pump pressure low

functions.name: Advisory L TRANS
functions.description: Low air pressure to the left feeder tank

functions.name: Advisory R TRANS
functions.description: Low air pressure to the right feeder tank

functions.name: Advisory AUT FLP
functions.description: Auto flap mode or ADC failed

functions.name: Advisory APU GEN
functions.description: APU selected and emergency generator failed

functions.name: Advisory STBY TRU
functions.description: Standby TRU inoperative or off line

functions.name: Advisory C*AUT
functions.description: Computed delivery mode (AUTO and CCIP) not available

functions.name: Advisory H2O SEL
functions.description: Over 250 knots and water switch not OFF

functions.name: Advisory PITCH
functions.description: Pitch stab aug off or failed

functions.name: Advisory IFF
functions.description: Mode 4 off, not zeroized or not responding

functions.name: Advisory SPD BRK
functions.description: Gear up and speed brake extended. Gear down and speed brake not 250

functions.name: Advisory ROLL
functions.description: Roll stab aug off or failed

functions.name: Advisory YAW
functions.description: Yaw stab aug off or failed

functions.name: Advisory CW NOGO
functions.description: Jammer Failure. Cannot jam CW radars

functions.name: Advisory P JAM
functions.description: Jammer Pod Active: Jamming Pulse-Doppler radar signals

functions.name: Advisory ENG EXC
functions.description: Engine overspeed, overtemperature or over g was detected

functions.name: Advisory P NOGO
functions.description: Jammer Failure. Cannot jam Pulse-Doppler radars

functions.name: Advisory CW JAM
functions.description: Jammer Pod Active: Jamming CW radar signals

functions.name: Brake accummulator
functions.description: Brake accummulator pressure in psi 600 to 3600 psi

functions.description: Cabin altitude pressue in feet 0 to +50000.

functions.description: Barometric altitude above sea level of the aircraft.
functions.altitudeComments: Value is adjusted per altimeter pressure setting.

functions.name: IAS Airspeed
functions.description: Current indicated air speed of the aircraft.

functions.description: Displayed when SAI is caged or non-functional.

functions.description: Current bank displayed on the SAI.

functions.name: SAI Pitch
functions.description: Current pitch displayed on the SAI.

functions.name: Angle of Attack
functions.description: Current angle of attack of the aircraft.

functions.name: Slip Ball
functions.description: Current position of the slip ball relative to the center of the tube.
functions.valueDescription: (-1 to 1) -1 is full left and 1 is full right.

functions.name: Turn Indicator
functions.description: Current position of the turn indicator.
functions.valueDescription: (-1 to 1) -1 is full left and 1 is full right.

functions.name: Slip/Turn Flag
functions.description: OFF Flag for the Slip / Turn gauge.
